means: （用不同的录音手段）转录( transcribe的过去式和过去分词 )
改编（乐曲）（以适应他种乐器或声部）

sentence.Network_en: He transcribed two paragraphs from the book into his notebook.
sentence.Network_cn: 他把书中的两段抄在笔记本上.

sentence.Network_en: Every telephone conversation will be recorded and transcribed.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有电话交谈都将被录音并作全文转写。

sentence.Network_en: The minutes of their meeting were fully transcribed in the bulletin.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的会议记录详尽地登载在会刊中.

PerfectNetExp.abs: transcribe 转换, transcribed 转录的, transcribe 预录
The purpose of all this transcribed genomic informationremainsunclear ., 所有这一被转录的基因信息的目的仍不清晰.
a performance now transcribed onto compact disc ., 现已制成激光唱片的一次演出.
Read the transcribed passages with proper pause and correct intonation ., 用适当的停顿和正确的语调朗读用音标写成的段落.

entry.def: If you transcribe a speech or text, you write it out in a different form from the one in which it exists, for example by writing it out in full from notes or from a tape recording.

example.ex: She is transcribing, from his dictation, the diaries of Simon Forman...
example.tran: 她正根据他的口述记录西蒙·福曼的日记。

example.ex: Every telephone conversation will be recorded and transcribed.
example.tran: 所有电话交谈都将被录音并作全文转写。

entry.tran: (为适合其他乐器演奏而)改编(乐曲)
entry.def: If you transcribe a piece of music for an instrument which is not the one for which it was originally written, you rewrite it so that it can be played on that instrument.

example.ex: He gave up trying to write for the guitar and decided to transcribe the work for piano.
example.tran: 他放弃了为吉他谱曲，决定把作品改编成钢琴曲。

means.word_mean: 1. taken down in writing especially from notes or dictated or recorded information

auth_sentence.content: I'd transcribed his words, of course, and reported them.
auth_sentence.res_content: I'd transcribed his words, of course, and reported them.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I'd transcribed his words, of course, and reported them.

auth_sentence.content: Those instructions simply aren't transcribed, and the molecules never form.
auth_sentence.res_content: Those instructions simply aren't transcribed, and the molecules never form.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Those instructions simply aren't transcribed, and the molecules never form.

auth_sentence.content: Finally, oral tales, when transcribed faithfully, are often barely readable.
auth_sentence.res_content: Finally, oral tales, when transcribed faithfully, are often barely readable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Finally, oral tales, when transcribed faithfully, are often barely readable.
